query:
ALTER TABLE upgrade_violations 
ADD COLUMN flagged BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE AFTER resolvedBy,
ADD COLUMN flaggedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER flagged,
ADD COLUMN flaggedBy VARCHAR(255) NULL AFTER flaggedAt,
ADD COLUMN flagNotes TEXT NULL AFTER flaggedBy;
